Warrick Dunn is the greatest RB draft pick in Buc History. The RARE 1st round pick that exceeded expectations, Dunn was the Offensive of Rookie of the Year followed by 3 Pro Bowl selections. Dunn lead the NFL with 5.4 yards per carry after signing as a free agent with the Falcons. Dunn had over 1,000 yards total offense each of his 5 seasons as a Buc and for 10 consecutive seasons, including the Falcons. Dunn is one of only four players in NFL History to rush for over 10,000 years AND receive over 500 passes. Dunn won numerous other awards for his charitable and community involvement including the Walter Payton Man of the Year Award and the Bart Starr Man of the Year Award. The city of Tampa, NFL and the World owe a debt of gratitude to Warrick Dunn.
